mapper.sql: class_id, class_num, class_name, class_sum, open_time, project_id, status, create_time
mapper.select: select t1.class_id, t1.class_num, t1.class_name, t1.class_sum, t1.open_time, t1.project_id, t2.project_name, t1.status, t1.create_time, (select count(*) from exam_class_project where class_id = t1.class_id and status='1') as class_count from exam_class_info t1,exam_project_info t2 where t1.project_id=t2.id and t1.class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: update exam_class_info set status='0' where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into exam_class_info (class_id, class_num, class_name, class_sum, open_time, project_id, status, create_time) values (#{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into exam_class_info
class_id,
class_num,
class_name,
class_sum,
open_time,
project_id,
status,
create_time,
#{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{classSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update exam_class_info
class_num = #{classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
class_sum = #{classSum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_class_info set class_num = #{classNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_name = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_sum = #{classSum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, open_time = #{openTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update exam_class_project set class_id=#{id} where id in (select id from (select * from exam_class_project where status='1' and class_id is null and audit_status='审核通过' order by id limit #{count}) as t)
